CustomField.description: If indicated no, the student does not reside within the Greenfield Public Schools District, please review the following list of additional student situations that can result in enrollment preference. You may choose more than one selection or indicate that none of the situations apply. Please note that relevant documentation substantiating any claim for preference may be requested
CustomField.label: MAVA Not GCVS District Situation

value.fullName: None of these situations apply to my student
value.label: None of these situations apply to my student

value.fullName: Students in training for competitive arts or sports
value.label: Students in training for competitive arts or sports

value.fullName: Students out of school due to pregnancy or parenting
value.label: Students out of school due to pregnancy or parenting

value.fullName: Students who have been bullied or who are out of school due to other safety concerns
value.label: Students who have been bullied or who are out of school due to other safety concerns

value.fullName: Students who must work during the day
value.label: Students who must work during the day

value.fullName: Students who seek an advanced coursework not available in their current school
value.label: Students who seek an advanced coursework not available in their current school
